short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check Typo is your AI spell-checker for all languages. It fixes typos, corrects grammar, and enhances your writing quality!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Writing with Check Typo – Your Ultimate AI-Powered Language Assistant for Seamless Communication. Discover the power of error-free writing with Check Typo, the leading Chrome extension designed to enhance your text across all major platforms. Whether you’re drafting an email, posting on social media, or engaging in online discussions, Check Typo ensures your content is flawless and professional.

Key Features: A context aware spell-checker for extreme accuracy.

- AI-Powered Accuracy: Leverage advanced artificial intelligence to spot and correct errors in real-time. Check Typo's AI continuously improves, adapting to your writing style and providing more accurate suggestions over time.

- One-Click Spell Check: With just a click on the [Check] button, Check Typo instantly identifies and corrects spelling and grammar mistakes, ensuring your writing is always polished.

- Multilingual Support: As an AI-powered tool, Check Typo works with any language, making it perfect for global communication and multilingual users.

- Professional Writing Styles: Choose from various writing styles like Corporate, Friendly, Humorous, Scientific, and more to match your content’s tone.

Perfect for Everyone:
From professionals and content creators to students and everyday users, Check Typo is your essential tool for clear, effective communication. This premium extension not only improves your writing quality but also boosts your confidence in online interactions.


Our user Feedback-Driven Development:
Even if Check Typo works on most platforms and well-known websites, we couldn't tested all of them. You want us to support a new website? As a user, you can request new websites where Check Typo doesn’t work, ensuring a seamless experience wherever you write.

Why Choose Check Typo?
Designed to integrate effortlessly with your workflow, Check Typo brings advanced AI-powered language tools to your fingertips. Make every word count and communicate with confidence, knowing that your writing is error-free and professional. With a paid subscription, enjoy the benefits of continuous improvements and premium features that keep your writing sharp and effective.

DEV CHANGELOG

May 23: Major Update: Check Typo is now available across all your favorite websites. Enjoy flawless writing everywhere!

Jan 23: New Feature: Content Writing Style Selection. Transform your writing experience with our new style selection option, allowing you to not only perform a grammar check but also choose from various writing styles such as Corporate, Friendly, Humorous, Scientific, Native speaker, and more.
2023

Dec 29: UI/UX Improvements. Enhanced user experience with the ability to use Check Typo outside of X (in-extension). Enjoy a more intuitive and streamlined interface for all your grammar and spell-check needs.
Dec 28: Security Update. Added a show/hide toggle for the password field during login for improved security. Streamlined the interface by removing unused elements for a cleaner, more efficient user experience.
